CustomField.formula: if(NOT(ISBLANK(Approver_3__c)), Approver_3__r.FirstName+' '+ Approver_3__r.LastName,If(NOT(ISBLANK(EMS_LM_2nd_Approver__c)), EMS_LM_2nd_Approver__r.FirstName+' '+ EMS_LM_2nd_Approver__r.LastName, EMS_LM_Approver__r.FirstName+' '+ EMS_LM_Approver__r.LastName ) )
CustomField.label: Final Approver
